author: Liam Baer
description: If you like the Penicillin Cocktail, then you'll also like this rosemary, ginger, lemon and honey infused bourbon cocktail, shaken and served on-the-rocks.
name: Honey Badger
recipeIngredient: 10 ml Honey syrup (3 honey to 1 water)

recipeInstructions.text: De-stalk a sprig of rosemary and MUDDLE the leaves with bourbon in base of shaker
Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and strain into ice-filled glass
